CONTROLLER_STOP_ADDRESS
[CONTROLLER]


Classes

class  INSTLIB::CONTROL_STOP_ADDRESS

INT32 INSTLIB::CONTROL_STOP_ADDRESS::CheckKnobs (CONTROL_HANDLER ch, VOID *val)

Detailed Description

Controller for detecting the end of an interval using an address or symbol and a count Use -stop_address [address|address:count|symbol|symbol:count|address:count]

Function Documentation

VOID *  val
)  [inline, inherited]
 

Activate the controller if the -stop_address knob is provided

Returns:
1 if controller can start an interval, otherwise 0

VOID INSTLIB::CONTROL_STOP_ADDRESS::Event (  CONTROL_EVENT  ev  )  [inline, inherited]
 

Notify the controller about a start event. It uses the address/count to find the end of the interval
